channel.title: Text analysis on Yiwen Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Text analysis on Yiwen Wu

item.title: Ideas of Sentiment Analysis Project
item.description: Sentiment Analysis of Online Education Programs The sentiment analysis (SA) by Liu 2014 brought many good aspects to both academics and web-based industries. 当下SA已经被用于分析顾客反馈，例如航空网络售票系统。 对于用网络授课的公司网页系统，我们将进行网页数据抓取(web scraping)，然后利用Liu的方法进行public opinion分析。主要步骤如下： Retriving Parsing Exploring & Analyzing Visualizing 研究目的如下： 探索学生偏好。由于网上教育是一种新型授课模式，用public opinion的方式来探索学生对课程的评价 教育项目/课程评估 教师评估 References for future students and program managers

item.title: Text Analysis-Python
item.description: This is a brief introduction to text analysis by using python. To be general, the processes are as follows: Set up correct working directory for importing document to process. Import .txt files in Python. Work towards the clean dataset as needed. Visualize data as requested. There are many different ways to clean the dataset and alternate algorithms for text analysis. The following is the code along with some explaination of what I have learned for processing texts.
